# Government Tender Announcement
### Intermediate Life Cycle Management Specialist

#### Contractor Details

| **Field Name** | **English** | **French** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Contracting Entity Name | Department of National Defence | Ministère de la défense nationale |
| Contracting Entity Address | 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, ON, K1A0K2, Canada | 101, promenade Colonel By, Ottawa, ON, K1A0K2, Canada |
| Contact Person | Amy Lee Gönye | Amy Lee Gönye |

#### Contract Scope

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking a contractor to provide a Task Based Professional Service (TSPS) in the form of one (1) Intermediate Life Cycle Management Specialist (LCMS) under Stream 5, Technical Engineering and Maintenance Services (TEMS). The contractor will provide quality assurance related activities and on-site management support for the repair and overhaul or manufacturing of military components, equipment, and systems for a duration of one (1) year, with three (3) one-year irrevocable options to extend the contract.

#### Bidder Requirements

Bidders must hold a valid Supply Arrangement (SA) under E60ZT-18TSPS and be prequalified for Tier 1 for the category 5.16 Life Cycle Management Specialist.

#### Security Requirements

The contractor is required to meet the Security Requirements Checklist (SRCL) #20 as outlined by the Government of Canada.

#### Bid Submission Details

Bidders must submit their proposals electronically through the Government Electronic Tenders System (https://canadabuys.canada.ca). A Request for Proposal (RFP) document will be sent directly to the prequalified bidders.
